message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $10200. This is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10050. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not willing to give up too much more. I'm offering it to you for $10300. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10150. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to protect my interests. I'm offering it to you for $10250. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10125. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm getting close to my limits, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to prioritize my own interests. I'm offering it to you for $10200. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me at this price.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10100. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
